special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation.
descriptions: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, shield of faith
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, shield of faith

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person
* 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, clairvoyance

descriptions.raw: * 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement
* 5th level (2 slots): flame strike, geas

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Spit Poison.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
